______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

reject udp any any -> 100.1.10.10 any (msg:"UDP flood"; sid:3; rev:1; detection_filter:track by_dst, count 10, seconds 1;)

event_filter \
  gen_id 1, sig_id 1851, \
  track by_src, \
  count 3, seconds 1, \
  type limit

rate_filter \
  gen_id 1, sig_id 3, \
  track by_src, \
  count 1, seconds 1, \
  new_action drop, timeout 200
